content: **crocheted jumper in drops air the piece is worked top down with round yoke and lace pattern sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ai-379 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 300-350-400-400-450-500 g colour 33 pink sand crochet hook drops crochet hook size 5 mm **crochet gauge** 14 treble crochets in width and 8 5 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
